block.p: Sara Kathryn Bayles and Matthew Alan Michaelis were married yesterday by the Rev. Stanley Johnson, an Episcopal priest, at the Siasconset Union Chapel in Nantucket, Mass.

The bride, 32, is the manager of direct marketing for Teachers College Press, the publishing arm of Teachers College at Columbia University, where she is completing a doctorate in education. She graduated from the University of Arizona and received a master's degree in education from Harvard. She is the daughter of Kathryn and Ray Bayles of Tubac, Ariz. The bride's father, now retired, was the assistant area director of the Navajo Area Indian Health Service. Her mother is a professor and the head of the speech and hearing sciences department at the University of Arizona.

The bridegroom, 29, is an investment banker at Greenhill & Company, a mergers and acquisitions firm in New York. He graduated from the University of Kansas. His parents, Dee and Mike Michaelis, live in Wichita, Kan., where his father is the chairman of the Emprise Financial Corporation and his mother is a weaver.
